title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: blog print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen, printed to resemble very coarse linen. Off-set rows of yellow urns, wrapped with blue ribbon containing pink roses, blue, yellow and pink flowers. Between rows of urns are scrolling yellow vines with roses on blue ribbons.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: blog print on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-68.
